name: United Assault - Normandy '44
description:
United Assault - Normandy '44 is an open world rogue lite FPS set in 1944's depiction of Normandy.
You are a US army paratrooper dropped into enemy territory to prepare the D-Day. Your mission objectives vary form destroying Panzer IV tanks, Flak 88 cannons to obtaining secret documents or even liberate an entire town. After completing your objectives, exfiltrate and claim your rewards.

Higher ranks will unlock new weapons and allow you to customize your start loadout.

Features

  • 15 towns and settlements based on their real world location
  • Dynamic mission generator
  • Passive Multiplayer
  • Over 15 authentic weapons (7 available at early access start)
  • Detailed progression system
  • Uncover a mysterious secret protected by highly trained german troops
  • Nvidia DLSS 2.0 support

Passive Multiplayer

United Assault - Normandy '44 supports a unique passive Multiplayer. You'll play your singleplayer game and your gameplay stats will be shared with a server (no personal data will be collected and no account required).
This Server can analyze the stats from all players and can launch dynamic events in game. Those Events can range from simple additional objectives over to map changing mega events. We as the developers are also able to design new Missions with this tool without the need to update the game.

You are streaming this game? If we notice it, we can grab your ID from the Screen and can directly send you missions, challanges and manipulate your game! For maximum mayhem!

At Early Access Start, the server will only collect stats to build up a database, sending events will be enabled shortly after Early Access Start.
